tuv.seg: If you are interested in studying in a European Union member state, another European country or a country outside Europe this document covers the options available to you
Clúdaíonn an cháipéis seo na roghanna atá ar fáil duit má tá suim agat i staidéar a dhéanamh i mballstát den Aontas Eorpach, i dtír Eorpach eile nó i dtír lasmuigh den Eoraip
For information about the UK you can read our document about studying in the UK including Northern Ireland
Tá eolas ar staidéar san RA, Tuaisceart Éireann san áireamh le fáil in áit eile ar an láithreán gréasáin seo
People choose to study abroad for a number of reasons
Roghnaíonn daoine staidéar a dhéanamh thar lear ar roinnt cúiseanna
Entry requirements may be easier, you may have access to courses that are not available in Ireland or you may simply want the experience of studying outside Ireland

D'fhéadfadh na riachtanais iontrála a bheith níos éasca, d'fhéadfadh go mbeadh rochtain agat ar chúrsaí nach bhfuil ar fáil in Éirinn nó d'fhéadfadh go dteastaíonn uait taithí a fháil ar staidéar lasmuigh d'Éirinn
It is important to know the differences between studying in Ireland and studying abroad
Tá sé tábhachtach go mbeadh na difríochtaí idir staidéar in Éirinn agus staidéar thar lear ar eolas agat
You should find out about the application procedures, length of courses, fees and living expenses before you make a final decision on whether a course of study abroad is suitable for you
Ba chóir modhanna iarratais, fad na gcúrsaí, táillí agus costais mhaireachtála a thabhairt faoi deara sula ndéanann tú cinneadh faoi chúrsa staidéir thar lear a bheith oiriúnach duitse
Finding out about courses and studying abroad
Níos mó a fháil amach faoi chúrsaí agus staidéar thar lear
If you are a third-level student in Ireland your university or college may have information about opportunities for studying outside Ireland
Más mac léinn tríú leibhéal in Éirinn tú d'fhéadfadh go mbeadh eolas ag d'ollscoil nó choláiste faoi dheiseanna chun staidéar a dhéanamh lasmuigh d'Éirinn
You can also get information by applying directly to a third-level institution for a prospectus
Is féidir leat eolas a fháil chomh maith trí iarraidh go díreach ar institiúid tríú leibhéal réamheolaire a sheoladh chugat
If you do not have a specific course or institution in mind, there are a number of sources of information on studying abroad:
Mura bhfuil cúrsa nó institiúid ar leith ar intinn agat, tá roinnt foinsí eolais ar staidéar thar lear:
• The European Commission provides information about studying in Europe
• Tá faisnéis faoi na hinstitúidí ard-leibhéil i 32 dtíortha Eorpacha ar an láithreán gréasáin Study in Europe
It provides information on admission, fees and other areas of interest while studying in Europe
Tá treoracha anseo maidir le cúrsa a róghnú, iarratas a dhéanamh agus conaí san Eoraip
• The European Youth Portal is a source of information for young people about studying in Europe both in the European Union and in non-EU countries
• Is foinse eolais do dhaoine óga é an European Youth Portal faoi staidéar san Eoraip, san Aontas Eorpach agus i dtíortha neamh-AE araon
It has information on a wide range of other topics for young people including working, travelling, and volunteering in Europe
Tá eolas ann faoi raon leathan ábhar do dhaoine óga lena n-áirítear oibriú, taisteal, agus oibriú go deonach san Eoraip
• UNESCO produces an international guide to studying abroad
• Táirgeann UNESCO treoir idirnáisiúnta ar staidéar thar lear
It includes a searchable online database of higher-education study opportunities and the scholarships offered by higher education institutions and international organisations in many countries

Áiríonn sé bunachar sonraí ar féidir a chuardach de dheiseanna staidéir ardoideachais agus de na scoláireachtaí arna dtairiscint ag institiúidí ardoideachais agus eagraíochtaí idirnáisiúnta i mbreis agus tír
It also has contact details and information on admission requirements, application deadlines, financial aid, fees, living expenses and other relevant information for all courses
Soláthraíonn sé sonraí teagmhála agus eolas ar riachtanais iontrála, spriocdhátaí iarratais, cúnamh airgeadais, táillí, costais mhaireachtála agus eolas ábhartha eile do na cúrsaí go léir chomh maith
• WorldWide Classroom is a source of information on courses, student services and practical country information worldwide
• Is foinse eolais ar chúrsaí, sheirbhísí do mhic léinn agus eolas praiticiúil ar thíortha ar fud an domhain é WorldWide Classroom
You can use the international programme finder to search for a course in the country and language of your choice
Is féidir leat leas a bhaint as an aimsitheoir cláir idirnáisiúnta chun cuardach a dhéanamh ar chúrsa i do rogha de thír agus theanga
Many Irish third-level institutions offer their students the opportunity to travel through their course of study, often through student exchange programmes
Tairgeann mórán institiúidí tríú leibhéal in Éirinn deis dá mic léinn taisteal trína gcúrsaí staidéir. Baintear é seo amach go minic trí leas a bhaint as cláir mhalairte mac léinn
Irish institutions establish initial contact with institutions abroad and maintain an ongoing relationship with them
Bunaíonn institiúidí Éireannacha conradh tosaigh le hinstitiúidí thar lear agus coimeádann siad caidreamh leanúnach leo
Students move between the two institutions on study and work placements and are offered services such as student orientation, language training, and accommodation services
Bogann mic léinn idir an dá institiúid ar shocrúcháin staidéir agus oibre agus tairgtear seirbhísí dóibh ar nós ionduchtú do mhic léinn, oiliúint teanga, agus seirbhísí lóistín
Contact your college for information about any student exchange programmes they may offer
Téigh i dteagmháil le do choláiste chun eolas a fháil faoi aon chláir mhalairte mac léinn a d'fhéadfadh a bheith acu
The previous programmes have now closed and no further applications under those programmes can be accepted
Tá na cláir roimhe dúnta anois agus ní féidir glacadh le haon iarratais bhreise faoi na cláir sin
Existing projects funded by those programmes will wind down over the next 1 - 3 years
Tiocfaidh tionscadail reatha a maoiníonn na cláir sin iad chun deiridh sna chéad 1 - 3 bliain atá romhainn
Erasmus+ will provide opportunities for participants who include students and education staff, to study, train, get work experience and volunteer abroad

Cuirfidh Erasmus+ deiseanna ar fáil do rannpháirtithe lena n-áirítear mic léinn agus foireann oideachais, chun staidéar a dhéanamh, oiliúint a fháil, taithí oibre a ghnóthú agus oibriú go deonach thar lear
In addition to providing grants for individuals, Erasmus+ will support transnational partnerships among education, training and youth institutions and organisations
De bhreis ar dheontais a chur ar fáil do dhaoine aonair, tacóidh Erasmus+ le comhpháirtíochtaí trasnáisiúnta i measc institiúidí agus eagraíochtaí oideachais, oiliúna agus óige
It will also support national efforts to modernise education, training and youth systems
Chomh maith leis sin, tacóidh sé le hiarrachtaí náisiúnta córais oideachais, oiliúna agus óige a nuachóiriú
For the first time it will provide support to sport initiatives
Den chéad uair riamh, cuirfidh sé tacaíocht ar fáil do thionscnaimh spóirt
The International Education Financial Aid (IEFA) website provides a database of financial aid information for students who want to study in a foreign country
Soláthraíonn láithreán gréasáin International Education Financial Aid (IEFA) bunachar sonraí d'eolas ar chúnamh airgeadais do mhic léinn gur mian leo staidéar i dtír eachtrach
The site contains a comprehensive list of grants, scholarships, loan programmes and other information that may be helpful to those interested in studying abroad
Cuimsíonn an láithreán gréasáin liosta cuimsitheach de dheontais, scoláireachtaí, chláir iasachta agus eolas eile a d'fhéadfadh a bheith ina chabhair dóibh siúd a bhfuil suim acu i staidéar thar lear
Erasmus+ provides students with a mobility grant
Tugann an clár Erasmus+ deontas soghluaisteachta do mhic léinn

In Ireland maintenance grants under the Student Grants Scheme are available for undergraduate courses of at least 2 years’ duration in a publicly-funded third-level institution in another EU member state

In Éirinn tá deontais chothabhála faoin Scéim singil um Dheontais do Mhic Léinn le fáil do chúrsaí fochéime atá 2 bhliain ar a laghad i bhfad in institiúid tríú leibhéal a fhaigheann maoiniú poiblí i mballstát AE eile
Depending on your income you may be eligible for a maintenance grant provided that you fulfill the conditions as to residence, age, academic attainments and nationality
Ag brath ar d'ioncam d'fhéadfá a bheith incháilithe do dheontas cothabhála chomh fada is a chomhlíonann tú na coinníollacha maidir le cónaí, aois, éachtaí acadúla agus náisiúntacht
You can find detailed information on the range of Irish grants and funds for students in further and higher education on the website www.studentfinance.ie
Tá faisnéis mionsonraithe faoi dheontais agus chistí do mhic léinn san ardoideachas agus breisoideachas ar an suíomh gréasáin www.studentfinance.ie
Funding for postgraduate study
Maoiniú do staidéar iarchéime
There are different sources of funding for postgraduate students
Tá foinsí éagsúla de mhaoiniú do mhic léinn iarchéime
Some courses are advertised in the newspapers and include funding
Fógraítear roinnt cúrsaí sna nuachtáin agus bíonn maoiniú san áireamh
Sometimes financial support is available from the university that is running the postgraduate course; sometimes you need to apply to an external body
Bíonn tacaíocht airgeadais ar fáil uaireanta ón ollscoil a ritheann an cúrsa iarchéime; uaireanta bíonn ort iarratas a chur chuig comhlacht seachtrach
Awards are available for a range of subjects, both for taught courses and research programmes
Tá dámhachtainí le fáil do raon ábhar, do chúrsaí múinte agus chláir thaighde araon
They vary as to amount, duration and whether they only cover fees or include maintenance as well
Bíonn siad éagsúil ó thaobh méide, faid agus cibé an gclúdaíonn siad táillí amháin nó an gcuimsíonn siad cothabháil de chomh maith
There are strict eligibility rules and deadlines for application
Tá rialacha incháilitheachta diana ann agus spriocdhátaí d'iarratais
In addition, there are a large number of postgraduate students competing for limited funding
Chomh maith leis sin, tá roinnt mhaith iarchéimithe in iomaíocht do mhaoiniú teoranta

Postgraduate research/study scholarships: A number of scholarships for study abroad are awarded annually by foreign governments to Irish students who are engaged in, or have completed a course of third-level education

Scoláireachtaí staidéir/taighde iarchéime: Deonaíonn rialachais eachtracha roinnt scoláireachtaí chun staidéar thar lear gach bliain do mhic léinn Éireannacha atá i mbun chúrsa oideachais tríú leibhéal, nó a bhfuil sé curtha i gcrích acu

Details of scholarships are circulated to universities and other relevant third-level institutions of education. Details of scholarships are also published on the Department of Education and Skills website
Scaiptear sonraí na scoláireachtai seo chuig ollscoileanna agus institiúidí oideachais tríú leibhéal ábhartha eile agus foilsítear ar láithreán gréasáin na Roinne Oideachais agus Scileanna iad

If you are interested in applying for these scholarships, you should contact the International Section of the Department of Education and Skills and ask to be placed on a mailing list for the scholarship offers

Má tá suim agat iarratas a chur isteach ar na scoláireachtaí seo, ba chóir duit dul i dteagmháil leis an Rannóg Idirnáisiúnta den Roinn Oideachais agus Scileanna agus iarraidh orthu tú a chur ar liosta poist do na tairiscintí scoláireachta
Application forms and relevant details will then be posted to you when the offers are open to receive applications
Seolfar foirmeacha iarratais agus sonraí ábhartha chugat ansin nuair a bheidh na tairiscintí oscailte chun iarratais a fháil
Tax relief on tuition fees
Faoiseamh cánach ar tháillí teagaisc
If you are not eligible for a maintenance grant you or your parent may claim tax relief on third-level fees as follows:
Mura bhfuil tú incháilithe do dheontas cothabhála d'fhéadfá, nó d'fhéadfadh do thuismitheoir, faoiseamh cánach ar tháillí tríú leibhéal a éileamh mar seo a leanas:
Undergraduate courses: Tax relief is available for tuition paid for approved full-time/part-time undergraduate courses in both private and publicly funded third-level colleges in any EU member state

Cúrsaí fochéime Tá faoiseamh cánach le fáil do theagasc íoctha ar chúrsaí formheasta fochéime lánaimseartha/páirtaimseartha i gcoláistí tríú leibhéal arna maoiniú go poiblí agus go príobháideach araon i mballstát ar bith den AE
It is also available on full-time/part-time undergraduate courses operated by colleges in any EU member state providing distance education in the State
Tá sé le fáil chomh maith ar chúrsaí fochéime lánaimseartha/páirtaimseartha arna reáchtáil ag coláistí mballstát ar bith den AE a sholáthraíonn cianoideachas sa Stát

Postgraduate courses: You can claim tax relief on third-level fees for postgraduate courses in a university or publicly funded college in another EU member state, including colleges that provide distance education in the state

Cúrsaí iarchéime: Is féidir leat faoiseamh cánach a éileamh ar tháillí tríú leibhéal do chúrsaí iarchéime in ollscoil nó i gcoláiste a fhaigheann maoiniú poiblí nó i mballstát AE eile, lena n-áirítear coláistí a sholáthraíonn cianoideachas sa stát
Tax relief is also available for postgraduate courses in a university or publicly funded third-level college in non-EU countries
Tá faoiseamh cánach le fáil do chúrsaí iarchéime in ollscoil nó i gcoláiste tríú leibhéal a fhaigheann maoiniú poiblí i dtíortha lasmuigh den AE chomh maith
Application forms for student grants are available from Student Universal Support Ireland (SUSI)
Tá foirmeacha iarratais ar dheontais do mhic léinn ar fáil ó Thacaíocht Uilíoch do Mhic Léinn, Éire (SUSI)
You can get an application form for tax relief on tuition fees from your local tax office
Is féidir leat foirm iarratais ar fhaoiseamh cánach ar tháillí teagaisc a fháil ó d'oifig chánach áitiúil
